channel.title: Comments on: Kuri Vision: How Kuri Captures Moments
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Arun K NANDETY
item.dc:creator: Arun K NANDETY
item.description: I think little robot will b an wonderful addition to my family can't wait to see it here roaming about it will b an wonderful home survelence product to home without the neediness of a dog. Or the odors n cleanliness setbacks of a pet now if it document my sugars n give med reminders it would serve a mlti purpose unit even adding a EKG sensor as part of its role in a household would make kuri outstanding after my recent stroke Kirin will b my greatest companion
item.content:encoded: I think little robot will b an wonderful addition to my family can’t wait to see it here roaming about it will b an wonderful home survelence product to home without the neediness of a dog. Or the odors n cleanliness setbacks of a pet now if it document my sugars n give med reminders it would serve a mlti purpose unit even adding a EKG sensor as part of its role in a household would make kuri outstanding after my recent stroke Kirin will b my greatest companion

item.title: By: Calvin
item.dc:creator: Calvin
item.description: Am very impressed by this smart home robot especially its imaging sensors. Cheers
item.content:encoded: Am very impressed by this smart home robot especially its imaging sensors. Cheers
